Cut vegetables until 200g.
This salad was introduced for children who often do not like some strange and unusual ingredients.
As for beer, we are sorry that you do not like the Kronenburg blank, but we are currently working on introducing Chinese beer.
As for citrus tea, there is no powder at all: it is brewed on the basis of green tea and citrus and berries are added there, precisely because there is no powder or sugar or syrup - it is not very saturated, but it is a plus - it is completely healthy drink
